about_the_game:
A complete set of illustrations for the game!
Please yourself with art!
The set includes 646 illustrations for the game! Including the main art, endings and art of the main menu!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes of cruelty, violence and murder. A lot of blood. There is also sexually explicit content in a light form. Partially naked body.
Drinking alcoholic beverages.
